commit message: Added ic_logo.png missing from this newly created project compared to the old project.
- Fixed parceling error and caching error.
- Added build variants for debug and release.
- Added bad and mock modules for debug build.
- As a result of a bad module test, Observable.create() replaces Obserable.just() as it the later does not stream errors automatically.
- Fixed issue of new stories not being appended to the anthology and the adapter properly.
- Fixed issue of adapters not notifying a range insert properly.

- Fixed issue of shared references between an anthology and an adapter over a list of stories such that updates to the list perform twice. However, it enforces a dependency upon the anthology to the adapter without relying on references implicitly.
- Updated project to utilize Gradle 1.1.0 plugin.
- Updated ViewHolders to use Butter Knife.
- Updated GMHApplication to allow the initial object graph to be altered for testing dynamically.

- Allowed modules to be independently injected for testing.
- Split BadGMHServiceModule into two for GET and POST requests.

- Changed Observable.just(new Response()...) to Observable.empty() to signify dummy completion.
- Split BadGMHServiceImpl into two for GET and POST requests.
- Added UI tests. @Tests should not be executed independently to ensure @Before and @After are called.
- Added null check into conditionPullNextAnthology() for HotPresenterImpl and TrendingPresenterImpl due to crash report stack trace.
- Removed accidental file uploaded in prior commits.
